tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Healthcare_Provider_Performance_Metrics (
    Provider_ID UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    Provider_Name VARCHAR(100),
    Performance_Score FLOAT,
    Patient_Satisfaction_Score FLOAT,
    Quality_of_Care_Score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
	metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	provider_id INT,
	service_type VARCHAR(50),
	efficiency_rating FLOAT,
	patient_satisfaction_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  treatment VARCHAR(500)
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  metric_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_satisfaction (
    satisfaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Providers (
 provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 provider_name VARCHAR(255),
 specialty VARCHAR(100),
 location VARCHAR(100),
 average_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
 patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(255),
 patient_age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 provider_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES Providers(provider_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
 appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 appointment_date DATE,
 appointment_time TIME,
 patient_id INT,
 provider_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES Providers(provider_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
 rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 rating_value INT,
 feedback TEXT,
 patient_id INT,
 provider_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES Providers(provider_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
 metrics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 provider_id INT,
 patient_id INT,
 average_wait_time INT,
 patient_satisfaction_rating INT,
 quality_of_care_rating INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES Providers(provider_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)
